MathExpression.Script: ('Tire Temp Avg FL' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg FR' [C]) / 2
('Tire Temp Avg RL' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg RR' [C]) / 2
'Tire Temp Avg F' [C] / ('Tire Temp Avg F' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg R' [C])
abs('Tire Temp Avg FL' [C] - 'Tire Temp Avg FR' [C])
abs('Tire Temp Avg RL' [C] - 'Tire Temp Avg RR' [C])
abs('Tire Temp Avg FL' [C] - 'Tire Temp Avg FR' [C])
abs('Tire Temp Avg RL' [C] - 'Tire Temp Avg RR' [C])

MathExpression.Comment: How the center temperature compares to the edge temperatures, >0 indicates pressure is too high
MathExpression.Script: 'Tire Temp Center FL' [C] - ('Tire Temp Inside FL' [C] + 'Tire Temp Outside FL' [C]) / 2

MathExpression.Comment: How the center temperature compares to the edge temperatures, >0 indicates pressure is too high
MathExpression.Script: 'Tire Temp Center FR' [C] - ('Tire Temp Inside FR' [C] + 'Tire Temp Outside FR' [C]) / 2

MathExpression.Comment: How the center temperature compares to the edge temperatures, >0 indicates pressure is too high
MathExpression.Script: 'Tire Temp Center RL' [C] - ('Tire Temp Inside RL' [C] + 'Tire Temp Outside RL' [C]) / 2

MathExpression.Comment: How the center temperature compares to the edge temperatures, >0 indicates pressure is too high
MathExpression.Script: 'Tire Temp Center RR' [C] - ('Tire Temp Inside RR' [C] + 'Tire Temp Outside RR' [C]) / 2

MathExpression.Id: Tire Presure Temp Lap Avg FL
Tire Presure Temp Lap Avg FR
Tire Presure Temp Lap Avg RL
Tire Presure Temp Lap Avg RR

MathExpression.Comment: Percentage of total temperature contributed by this corner
MathExpression.Script: 'Tire Temp Avg FL' [C] / ('Tire Temp Avg FL' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg FR' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg RL' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg RR' [C])

MathExpression.Comment: Percentage of total temperature contributed by this corner
MathExpression.Script: 'Tire Temp Avg FR' [C] / ('Tire Temp Avg FL' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg FR' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg RL' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg RR' [C])

MathExpression.Comment: Percentage of total temperature contributed by this corner
MathExpression.Script: 'Tire Temp Avg RL' [C] / ('Tire Temp Avg FL' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg FR' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg RL' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg RR' [C])

MathExpression.Comment: Percentage of total temperature contributed by this corner
MathExpression.Script: 'Tire Temp Avg RR' [C] / ('Tire Temp Avg FL' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg FR' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg RL' [C] + 'Tire Temp Avg RR' [C])

MathExpression.Id: Tire Temp Workload Lap Avg FL
Tire Temp Workload Lap Avg FR
Tire Temp Workload Lap Avg RL
Tire Temp Workload Lap Avg RR

MathExpression.Script: ('Tire Pressure FL' [kPa] + 'Tire Pressure FR' [kPa]) / ('Tire Pressure FL' [kPa] + 'Tire Pressure FR' [kPa] + 'Tire Pressure RL' [kPa] + 'Tire Pressure RR' [kPa])
